h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave
content: The good news is Kalpa-Wave is extremely susceptible to getting knocked down. So long as you build up some focus points with light attacks where possible, you can use your Pillar Stance heavy attack with three focus points built up to send the boss crashing to the ground -- which is the perfect time to Immobilize him on the ground and go wild with Spirit Attacks and Transformations.

The content is as follows:
The good news is Kalpa-Wave is extremely susceptible to getting knocked down. So long as you build up some focus points with light attacks where possible, you can use your Pillar Stance heavy attack with three focus points built up to send the boss crashing to the ground -- which is the perfect time to Immobilize him on the ground and go wild with Spirit Attacks and Transformations.
